EmailTemplate.description: S3 Vendor Line - New Service Request Notification
EmailTemplate.name: S3 Vendor Line - New Service Request Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: New Service Request {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you {!Case.Contact} for your inquiry.
Service request number {!Case.CaseNumber} has been created for your reference. You will receive another email when your inquiry has been resolved. If you would like to check status, please call the Sutter Health Vendor Line at 916-297-9300. Please have your service request number available when calling.
The Sutter Health Vendor Contact Center is available M-F, 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM PST.
Thank you,
Sutter Health
